title: Scp 8642 35
content:
You decide to investigate the computer setup, of course! Getting closer, you see that it’s quite impressive: three large monitors are connected into one massive display, while a smaller monitor to the side is constantly running codes in a console. Two keyboards are at Greg’s disposal, as well as several other means of input from complex mice to what looks like a tangle of game controllers. Under the desk are multiple towers of various sizes and makes, and looking closely you swear some of them are actually gaming consoles. (Is that a PS5???)

Suddenly you are aware that the click-clacks of typing have stopped. You glance up to see Greg glaring at you out of the corner of his eye. Embarrassed, you nervously clear your throat as your eyes suddenly become very interested in verifying that the ground is, indeed, made of ground. “Hannah said you could sit over there,” Greg states, gesturing to the table in the kitchenette. The annoyance in Greg’s voice doesn’t go unnoticed, but you also want to get the information you need as soon as possible. The best course of action, you think, would be to…

||= [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-8642/offset/36 Stay standing here.]||= 35||= [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-8642/offset/9 Go sit and wait in the kitchenette.]||

-----

author: TopHatBionicle
